description: Using <command> will show you all commands that are available in Git.
Using <command> will create an empty git repository or reinitialize an existing one.
important: This is a one time use per repository.

description: Using <command> will clone a repository into a new directory.
This command makes copy's of all files in the targeted directory.
important: This is a one time use per repository.

description: Using <command> will give you a list of all current branches of the repository you are in.
Using <command> will switch the branch you are currently on.
Will create the specified branch and will switch to that branch.
